advancements.immersive_weathering.moss.t: 生命のサイクルを 保持する？
advancements.immersive_weathering.moss.d: ＊(コケを 食べた) ＊(...コケっぽい味がした) ＊(HPが コケた)
advancements.immersive_weathering.icicle: バリバリ ボリボリボリ
advancements.immersive_weathering.ice_si: Slay a Blaze using its greatest fear, an Ice Sickle
Craft some Mulch, a dedicated farmer's best friend
advancements.immersive_weathering.flower: Put on a Flower Crown, the bees think you look cute in it
advancements.immersive_weathering.eat_az: Eat some Azalea Flowers, you know you want to
advancements.immersive_weathering.fulgur: Find a Fulgurite, a rare block that only occurs where lightning strikes sand
Travel the world and obtain all types of soil
advancements.immersive_weathering.bark_o: Apply Bark to a Stripped Log!
advancements.immersive_weathering.rust_o: Once iron has rusted too much, its impossible to scrape the rust off :pensive:
Apply a Wet Sponge to blocks made of Iron!
text.autoconfig.immersive_weathering.opt: Should any block growth mechanics occur?
Should brick blocks crack over time?
Should blocks become mossy over time?
Should iron blocks rust over time?
Should Leaf Piles accumulate below living trees?
Should decaying leaf blocks create falling leaf piles?
Should leaf piles convert Grass Blocks to Humus and Podzol?
Should wearing leggings prevent damage from thorny plants?
Should the Composter have a chance to drop dirt when clicked?
Should Charred Wood be formed when it is burned by fire?
Should Soot form next to Campfire smoke?
Should Lightning create Magma Blocks when striking Stone?
Should Lightning create Lava when striking Magma Blocks?
Should Lightning create Vitrified Sand when striking Sand?
Should cobwebs be flammable?
Should Ice melt in hot climates?
Should Icicles form below blocks while it snows?
Should any block generators be enabled?
Should Flowing Lava Turn to Basalt when touching Basalt below?
Should Deepslate be formed when Lava has Blue Ice above and below?
Should Granite be generated like Cobblestone with a Quartz Block and Diorite adjacent?
Should Andesite be generated like Cobblestone with Diorite adjacent?
Should Diorite be generated like Cobblestone with a Quartz Block adjacent?
Should Tuff be generated like Cobblestone with an Ash Block adjacent?
Should Lava turn to Blackstone when touching Blue Ice and a Magma Block?
Should Lava turn to a Magma Block when touching a bubble column?
Should Crying Obsidian form like Obsidian if the Lava touches Soul Fire?
Should Clay turn to Terracotta when touching Lava?
Should Sand turn to Vitrified Sand when touching Lava?
Should Water turn to Ice when touching Blue Ice?
Should Dirt, Gravel and Clay be able to be washed in Cauldrons?
Sticky a piston with a Slime Ball and un-sticky with shears?
Shear soil blocks to prevent growth?
Shear Flowering Azaleas to obtain flowers?
Shear mossy blocks to obtain Moss Clumps?
Burn mossy blocks to prevent moss from re-growing?
Use Flint and Steel to ignite charred blocks?
Use Shovel on Fire, Campfires and smoldering blocks to get Soot?
Use Wet Sponge to instantly rust iron?
Use Pickaxe to Crack bricks?
Obtain Bark from stripping logs?
Use Axe to Scrape Rust from iron?
Should Icicles generate in the world?
Should Cryosol and Permafrost generate in the world?
Should Humus generate in the world?
Should hanging roots generate in Dark Forest caves?
Should Fluvisol generate in the world?
Should Silt generate in the world?
Should Cracked Mud generate in the world?
Should Vertisol generate in the world?
Should Oak Leaf Piles generate in the world?
Should Dark Oak Leaf Piles generate in the world?
Should Birch Leaf Piles generate in the world?
Should Spruce Leaf Piles generate in the world?
